casebody.data:
Isabella S. FISHBLATT, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. William M. ELKINS et al., Defendants-Appellees. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 1, 1927. No. 16. Hirsh, Newman & Reass, of New York City (Hugh Hirsh, Emanuel Newman, and Benjamin Reass, all of New York City, and Charles Rothaus, of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellant. Davis, Polk, Wardwell, Gardiner & Reed, of New York City (John W. Davis, Theodore Kiendl, and William E. Stevenson, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs.
